quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: The ability to concentrate and to use time well is everything
author: Lee lacocca

quote: Concentration is the ability to think about absolutely nothing when it is absolutely necessary
author: Ray Knight

quote: if you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up
author: J.M. Power

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another
author: William James

quote: The ability to focus is a defining characteristic of successful individuals
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Concentration is the key to economic success
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: The difference between try and triumph is just a little umph!
author: Marvin Phillips

quote: The more focused you are, the more successful you will be
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Concentration is the secret of strength in politics, in war, in trade, in short, in all management of human affairs.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
